title: At GM Meetings, Brian Cashman Discusses Aaron Judge and Yankees Needs
description: Aaron Judge’s free agency looms over everything at the general managers’ meetings, but Brian Cashman says he has other holes to fill. Cashman’s own deal will have to wait.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:credit: Nathan Hunsinger for The New York Times
media:description: Aaron Judge turned down a $213.5 million contract extension last off-season. He reached free agency after a season in which he set an American League single-season record with 62 home runs.
